author: USA TODAY, Ben Crump, Opinion contributor
title: For black Americans, bias seen in coronavirus response is continuation of injustice
description: Blacks are dying at disproportionate rates. Two black men report cop kicking them from store for masks. Equity in response starts in justice system.
content:
Weve long known that its dangerous to be black in America.
Weve all watched cell phone and body cam footage of unarmed black men with their hands raised in surrender who are shot and killed by police. Weve seen people of color shot in the back while running … [+5547 chars]
